activities: ARCS (Automated Recruitment of Consumers System) a web-based program that can house a consumer database and can be programmed to recruit consumers, via automated phone or e-mail, for participation in studies.  L’Oréal Products, LLC manages a global site for consumers to join product panels. This site includes EU members and stores and processes information in the US.

personaldata: Personal data, such as First/Last Name, Address, Phone Number, Email, Date of Birth is collected via an on-line registration system.  For panelists who are paid for participation, also provides registrants bank information (Bank Name, Bank Location and Account Number.) Yes, data includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: L’Oréal USA has entered into a Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Agreement with the Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc.
